sentence: “Strong borders can only be achieved with strong leadership and Dave McCormick embodies the kind of strength needed to uphold the rule of law,” National Border Patrol Council president Brandon Judd said in a statement distributed by McCormick’s campaign.
author: Steven Nelson
title: Border Patrol union backs Pennsylvania GOP Senate contender McCormick

sentence: The race for the GOP nomination for an open U.S. Senate seat in Pennsylvania has been marked by attacks exchanged between two of the leading Republicans, Dr. Mehmet Oz and Dave McCormick.
author: Tom Kertscher
title: Dr. Oz claimed that GOP Senate rival McCormick ‘bragged’ about offshoring jobs. That lacks evidence

sentence: The endorsement came after months of behind-the-scenes jockeying by Oz and another leading candidate in Pennsylvania, Dave McCormick, a hedge fund executive.
author: Sarah Fortinsky
title: Trump endorses Mehmet Oz in Pennsylvania Senate race

sentence: RELATED: No proof for Dr. Oz’s claim that Pa. GOP Senate rival Dave McCormick ‘paid for attacks’ on Trump RELATED: In Pa. Senate run, Dr. Oz casts self as pro-Second Amendment, but he has backed gun-control measures RELATED: 2022 candidates use ads vowing to be tough on China, or attacking rivals as too soft on China
author: Tom Kertscher
title: Dr. Oz misses the facts in calling GOP Senate rival McCormick liberal and supportive of Biden, China

author: Jon Delano
title: David McCormick reacts to Trump's endorsement of Mehmet Oz and denies shipping jobs to China
